summary: Add\'s a new graphical effect to the Nightingale body armor similar to the Ebony Mail of Boethia.
descriptionHtml:
- NIGHTINGALE SHADOWCLOAK -

Add\'s a new graphical effect to the Nightingale body armor similar to the Ebony Mail of Boethia. A similar mod has been published by Carroto (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2869). I didn\'t want the poisoning effect on the Nightingale Armor though because the whole idea behind being an agent of Nocturnal is stealth not assassination. So I created my own version of this idea (didn\'t use any of Carrotos work).

I\'ve looked into the effect of Boethia\'s Mail myself and made a seperate new enchantment with altered effect textures, so that the Nightingale armor would emit a black shadowy mist when the character goes into hiding. I also removed the sound which is normally played when sneaking with Boethia\'s Mail.

This new effect is completely aesthetical and adds no new enchantments to the armor except the smoke.

Thanks for trying. If you like my mod please endorse.

Have fun!
author: pennox
